Package com.example.cmput301_team_project.model

Class MoodDisgust

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301_team_project.model.Mood
com.example.cmput301_team_project.model.MoodDisgust
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MoodDisgust extends Mood
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of disgust. Defines some emotional-state-specific attributes, such as display colour and emoji
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MoodDisgust

      public MoodDisgust(MoodSocialSituationEnum socialSituation, String trigger, boolean isPublic, String author, String imageBase64, com.google.firebase.firestore.GeoPoint location)
      Constructor of the MoodDisgust class Object, using the current date as the Mood's posted date.
      Parameters:
      socialSituation - a MoodSocialSituationEnum representing the users social situation.
      trigger - a String containing the user's reason why they are the Mood they're posting.
      isPublic - a boolean statement representing if the post is publicly available.
      author - a String of the user's username that is posting the Mood.
      imageBase64 - a base64-encoded String representing an image that the user can have with their Mood post.
      location - a GeoPoint showing the user's location where they posted the Mood.

    • MoodDisgust

      public MoodDisgust(MoodSocialSituationEnum socialSituation, String trigger, boolean isPublic, String author, Date date, String imageBase64, com.google.firebase.firestore.GeoPoint location)
      Constructor for the MoodDisgust class, with a specified date and time for the Mood.
      Parameters:
      socialSituation - a MoodSocialSituationEnum representing the users social situation.
      trigger - a String containing the user's reason why they are the Mood they're posting.
      isPublic - a boolean statement representing if the post is publicly available.
      author - a String of the user's username that is posting the Mood.
      date - The specified date and time of the Mood post.
      imageBase64 - a base64-encoded String representing an image that the user can have with their Mood post.
      location - a GeoPoint showing the user's location where they posted the Mood.
